feed.title: Dedicated server for bitcoin.org, your thoughts?

entry.title: Dedicated server for bitcoin.org, your thoughts?
entry.summary: In a conversation from 12/31/13, Mike Hearn suggested using a statistics package like Google Analytics for the new website design. However, this suggestion was rejected with the reasoning that "organizations are bad". Despite this, Hearn still believes that analytics software would be useful and suggests using a free alternative like Piwik instead of Google's package.
